A : [ 78432416, 39344977, 38228784, 57325761, 60282367, 84265033, 63527579, 15529028, 76229935, 87054738, 47211001, 82731635, 36813982, 4169668, 55914552, 12027462, 17930700, 67817015, 41017139, 54822431, 17267843, 73752906, 22934317, 30372396, 40917027, 58255953, 97430138, 66011487, 88831003, 87563581, 14759687, 62289524, 80043288, 93305932, 60045835, 34775175, 71708982, 13521456, 70916803, 79564495, 47497778, 76891507, 33633753, 25980940, 17495141, 98432856, 34060524, 39503983, 76233890, 78112853, 94992362, 73854302, 99974733, 95940483, 57769085, 95781478, 44868251, 25134768, 62379200, 34620786, 59296114, 73445208, 65521223, 4369329, 58242973, 50948180, 13760741, 83376278, 35078320, 73819927, 42680313, 19906657, 8756890, 27880209, 49060699, 12035297, 24938869, 68320610, 12365383, 1268056, 13268749, 88078150, 59816659, 6843742, 4224998, 16774792, 15097414, 66687149, 32409618, 50596307, 75491843, 89100752, 24980243, 70861700, 29145804, 79514921, 41044171, 98777394, 37895564, 12028885, 42320630, 14979248, 65538576, 23617315, 55136978, 67247368, 12885196, 75497640, 98029519, 51320541, 63540884, 7 ]
B : 





29142408 96900914 47643633 25600956 986911 33241567 35130512 61364249 26119128 81569090 91635831 97247359 45037745 31904909 54673090 80100357 60311424 97839419 6161921 5855642 85490583 8895855 4999668 79498545 16410898 36428669 95829734 67929370 23501247 20604289 65841571 36579436 85540779 50611501 97017110 75406495 2788165 11067297 29987972 35060790 13955633 78409075 24408671 33345689 79126700 67611854 9135304 8168449 64426647 54556598 8309156 99179916 98927394 16912233 83398490 45411952 80936726 83420385 95171622 56522572 15667902 32514679 86882845 37968282 45749363 6060705 48121277 99876929 80182723 6565340 50379312 53464135 16336446 58893477 3392286 87758756 96181980 42963360 69606955 65624625 75763726 9330652 69647380 31710655 29075552 51189550 67179105 40438597 2926535 51158970 96394184 82397489 13029776 12599326 63829983 98044630 62812530 43350778 72210215 61685965 18713524 57754600 98348561 3540592 29812028 12422471 44839076 67055862 55472297 75173312 60160476 76723929 45900688




1,2, 3,4,5,6

B =12

currentMaxsum  = 10
15-1 = 14
14-2 = 12
12-3 = 9 < B

o/p  = 11
currentSum = 0
maxSum = int.MinValue;
s = 0;
iterate i to n
	currentSum = currentSum + A[i];
	if (currentSum > B)
	{
		while(currentSum > B)
		{
			currentSum  = currentSum - A[s];
			s = s + 1;
		}
	
	}
	maxSum = max(maxSum, currentSum);

return currentSum;
